00028 class ISMADRMInfo {
00029 public:
00044   ISMADRMInfo(ByteT* data, UInt32T dataSize, UInt16T s_version,
00045       const std::string& k_uri, bool selective, ByteT key_ind_len, ByteT iv_len,
00046       DRMLogger& logger): contentID(), schemeVersion(s_version), kmsURI(k_uri),
00047       selectiveEnc(selective), keyIndicatorLen(key_ind_len), ivLen(iv_len) {
00049     if ((data == 0) || (dataSize == 0)) {
00050       logger.UpdateLog("ISMADRMInfo::ctor: invalid data for content identifier.");
00051       throw DRMInfoException();
00052     }
00053     // We must have a null terminated string.
00054     if (data[dataSize - 1] != '\0') {
00055       logger.UpdateLog("ISMADRMInfo::ctor: invalid data for content identifier.");
00056       throw DRMInfoException();
00057     }
00058     contentID = (const char*)data;
00059     if (contentID == "") {
00060       logger.UpdateLog("ISMADRMInfo::ctor: invalid content identifier.");
00061       throw DRMInfoException();
00062     }
00063   }

00079       const std::string& k_uri, bool selective, ByteT key_ind_len, ByteT iv_len,
00080       DRMLogger& logger): contentID(conID), schemeVersion(s_version), kmsURI(k_uri),
00081       selectiveEnc(selective), keyIndicatorLen(key_ind_len), ivLen(iv_len) {
00082     if (contentID == "") {
00083       logger.UpdateLog("ISMADRMInfo::ctor: invalid content identifier.");
00084       throw DRMInfoException();
00085     }
00086   }
